title: For people who live in the world of anime
body: Hi im levant newton ive notice a lack of anime loving people in the community of LOL im putting this up for any one who interested to join my anime club, so that we can have some equal ground standing players whose into talking about what they like and dislikes in anime and you know getting down with it, anyway add me on league and ask me to invite you. I will 100% do it 50% of the time well you know how it is, see you in space cowboys.

replies.body:
Im an avid Anime fan, I'm actually studying it for my postgraduate degree, so i will need the help of the anime community to answer a few questions for my research, so i may make use of your club once i have my survey ready (which should be soon) :p
i will add you when that happens :)

> lack of anime loving people in the community of LOL

There's a fucking anime series about LoL
